attributes.review: I’m utterly disappointed in this app. As much as I LOVE my country, this app was as much of a disaster as this generation!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! It also did t help that president trump started texting me every few seconds and startling my precious patriotic dogs and family. If I could give it zero, trust me I would 😡😡😡

not only did this app take 24 days to install but it took up 265 GB of storage 😠😠😠when i finally got to open the app i was absolutely disgusted by the image of a humongous orang pig on my screen, this caused internal bleeding and i was rushed to the ER, all i wanted to do was be patriotic and support señor don don🇫🇷🇫🇷horrible app🤬😡🧚🏽‍♂️✨
attributes.title: gaRBITCH

attributes.review: So like when I downloaded the app my phone crashed automatically 🗿 so I had to put the phone in rice which btw the rice was $4.55 which ain’t cheap 💅🏼so don’t download this it ain’t worth it unless you got some money to keep buying some rice. This app disgusting. 🤡
attributes.title: Just no 🙈✨🥰💅🏼

attributes.review: don’t get this app it’s very dangerous. when i got it i looked out my window and saw a dinosaur with a giraffe!! it’s was REALLY scary😹😹 then they tried to eat me through my window! when i deleted it, they went away. so i re download and there they were again, i was scared. 😹 PLEASE DONT GET IT FOR YOUR OWN SAFETY!!!😖🌝🥳🥰😹💀👀👁👄👁
attributes.title: DONT GET THIS APP💀💀💀

attributes.review: i support my president with my whole heart and the one chance i get to support him through a social network app it is trash. i can’t begin to start with the many hours it took to download. i waited 22 hours!!! that is almost a full day people! i should not have to wait such a long time to support my fascist preso. please don’t download this devil cursed app better yet take this app down better yet it shouldn’t have even been created! i am disturbed! wear ur masks karen’s n ken’s, sincerely ~ m.h.
attributes.title: waste of my time!

attributes.review: Me and my friend tried to run away to Canada but are parents wouldn’t let us. Then we tried to start our own ice cream business but I tried some it tasted awful and gave me food poisoning💩💩💩. In conclusion I do not like this app and it has more than one Russian hacker.
attributes.title: Awful🤬🤬🤬

attributes.review:
For the person who’s thinking about down loading this app, DO NOT! This app gives you all sorts of viruses. The people running this app sells all of the users information. 
⚠️ DO NOT GET THIS APP⚠️
They can get into your bank acc and take as much money out as they want!
attributes.title: To you

attributes.review: This app literally took me 49 hours to install and then after I had to completely buy and new phone because it corrupted all my data and I eventually lost my job because of the app never again🤢🤢🤢🤢
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: This app is the Most horrible app there is out there it’s supper dangerous for our safety theres a  rapist/racist on this app this needs to be taken off of the App Store Right now 😡 I will not be giving this app any stars. But I kinda can’t do that but If it allowed me I definitely will .
attributes.title: Very Upset 😡

attributes.review: The app would not download to my phone for 3 weeks & when it did it was simply terrible and impossible to navigate. Disappointed that our great leader would have such a terrible application.
attributes.title: Disappointed
